name: Harvester Saloon
description:
Welcome to Harvester Saloon! Harvest money from your patrons in any way you can!

*Get past wave 4 to see dark secret of Harvester Saloon!

Controls: WASD - Movement Space - Action

Credits Music: Pixelland - Kevin MacLeod (cc license) Sounds: pixabay.com, mixkit.co Sprites: icedman from opengameart.org

Created for Ludum Dare 52.
